ing: 1/3 head iceberg lettuce - rinsed, dried, and chopped
des: "Do your young kids hate salad? They'll love it after you serve them this one!"
ins:
Place bacon in a large, deep skillet. Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown. Drain, crumble and set aside.
Place lettuce in 4 small serving bowls, sprinkle with bacon and cheese.
Circle the bowl with croutons. Place three croutons on the cheese to represent the eyes and nose of a face.
With 1/4 of the tomato, cut a wedge to represent a smiling mouth. Place at bottom of bowl.
Drizzle with favorite salad dressing.
